comment: It's a real shame. I liked Amber Heard in Aquaman and she had good chemistry with Jason Momoa. Emilia Clarke is one of my favourite actresses and I loved her in Game of Thrones. Terminator Genisys. Me Before You and Solo: A Star Wars Story. Yesterday I watched Above Suspicion and I thought she gave an outstanding performance. Although Jason Momoa and Emilia Clarke had great chemistry in Game of Thrones, I saw a flaw in Emilia Clarke replacing Amber Heard as Mera. Emilia Clarke is 5'2" whilst Amber Heard is 5'7". If Emilia Clarke take over the role of Mera for Aquaman 2. Good luck to her. If not, I would like to see her be in a future DCEU or MCU movie. However, there are some other actresses who should be considered possible replacements such as Emily Blunt. Karen Gillan. Rachel Nichols and Anna Hutchison. Emily Blunt is 5'7" and I think Emily Blunt and Jason Momoa would look good together. There's no Aquaman without Mera. It would be great if Emilia Clarke does take over the role. At the end of the day, it will be Warner Bros. and DC Studios decision and only time will tell.
